/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A red bus is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the left side of the street, there's a building with a blue roof, its color contrasting beautifully with the greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the picturesque view of this worldwide landmark.
